General.Name: Avalon GloboCare Corp.
General.Description: Avalon GloboCare Corp., together with its subsidiaries, owns and operates commercial real estate properties in the United States. It also engages in the commercialization and development of the KetoAir device, a handheld device that detect acetone levels in exhaled breath, as well as the AI Nutritionist software program, which helps users monitor and manage ketogenic diet and related programs. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Freehold, New Jersey.
General.Address: 4400 Route 9 South, Freehold, NJ, United States, 07728
